summary: This bill, HR 2664, aims to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide additional funding and support for historically Black colleges and universities (HBCUs). Specifically, it focuses on strengthening arts, arts education, and cultural programs within HBCUs. The bill allows for financial assistance to students, establishment of outreach programs, comprehensive support services, and the preservation and exhibition of Black art collections. It also allows HBCUs to partner with the National Endowment for the Arts and defines 'arts' broadly.
